OkkeiPatcher.Changelog:
v1.40
- Bug fix: crashes when activity is not in foreground (not recommended to hide the app though).
- Change: delete temp save data on uninstall fail.
- Change: file copying and MD5 computing speed is again the same as in version 1.38 (was slower in 1.39).
v1.39
- Bug fix: crash on install fail.
- Bug fix: crash on computing MD5 of empty file.
v1.38
- Changed manifest implementation to support several patches.
v1.37
- Refactoring: prepared base for possible different implementations of patch (e.g. different languages).
v1.36
- Bug fix: incorrect configuration changes handling while requesting permissions.
v1.35
- Change: delete temp save data when process is aborted.
v1.34
- Big refactoring. The result is correct handling of configuration changes (such as screen rotation or locale change).
- Due to aforementioned change screen orientation is now not locked to portrait.
v1.33
- Refactoring.
v1.32
- Bug fix: exception on file download fail.
v1.31
- Bug fix: exception on manifest download fail.
v1.30
- Bug fix: save data backups from previous installations restore incorrectly.
- Bug fix: progress bar is not indeterminate when installing APK.
v1.29
- Refactoring.
v1.28
- Refactoring.
v1.27
- Bug fix: progress bar stuck in indeterminate state after uninstall fail.
v1.26
- Reduced APK size.
v1.25
- Change: indeterminate progress bar when no progress report available.
v1.24
- Small optimizations.
v1.23
- Change: changed patch size rounding to rounding half away from zero.
v1.22
- Bug fix: task not cancelling if an app update was canceled from a dialog.
v1.21
- Change: show current app version in app update dialog.
v1.20
- Bug fix: possible silent exception reports (without alert dialog).
v1.19
- New: double back button tap/double use of back gesture to exit app to prevent accidental app close.
v1.18
- Bug fix: PATCH button becomes unavailable if there is a patch update available and if an app update was aborted.
- Small optimizations.
v1.17
- Change: app update dialog shows after clicking OK in patch update dialog.
- Reduced APK size.
v1.16
- Bug fix: incorrect clearing of OkkeiPatcher directory in some cases.
v1.15
- Bug fix: app not responding to any actions if user wants to abort process and clicks OK after process has been stopped by itself.
- Bug fix: if an app update is corrupted app stops responding to actions.
- Bug fix: some fixes in patch process.
